column2: Papa Bear, this is Alpha leader. We've cleared the area around the houses. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Johan's Farm is neutralized. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Maarn is ours. Third objective complete. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Camerig has fallen. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. Objective One clear. Affirmative. Papa Bear out.
Understood, Alpha. Good work. Objective Two complete. Out.
Papa Bear to Alpha Black. We copy you Alpha. Out.
Alpha team, your mission is accomplished. Papa Bear signing off. Out.
